body_html:
@yaroslavvb Thank you nice tool! Something like this should definitely part of TF-core.
Do you have any experience with missing allocations or a wrong reported timeline?
As I reported in #17092 , I got the problem that an operation executed twice fails on its second execution, but all the memory prints look totally fine.
In addition, the mem_util tool reports no memory usage of the input tensor (Placeholder) - is this expected?
Thank you for your help 👍

body:
@yaroslavvb Thank you nice tool! Something like this should definitely part of TF-core.
Do you have any experience with missing allocations or a wrong reported timeline?
As I reported in #17092 , I got the problem that an operation executed twice fails on its second execution, but all the memory prints look totally fine.
In addition, the mem_util tool reports no memory usage of the input tensor (Placeholder) - is this expected?
Thank you for your help :+1:
